WanVideoIntegratedKSampler.description: ğŸ³ WanVideo Integrated KSampler - Github: https://github.com/luguoli - K-sampler for video generation with integrated high/low noise stages, supports text-to-video/image-to-video modes, supports generating videos with start/end frames, batch generation, automatic VRAM/RAM management, sage attention, block swapping, SD3 sampling, sound notifications and more comprehensive features, no need to connect so many wires~~~~ - ğŸ“§Email: luguoliï¹«vip.qq.com

model_high_noise.tooltip: ğŸ”¥ High Noise Model - Diffusion model for high noise phase (first stage)

model_low_noise.tooltip: â„ï¸ Low Noise Model - Diffusion model for low noise phase (second stage)

clip.tooltip: ğŸŸ¡ CLIP - CLIP model for text encoding and conditioning

positive_prompt.tooltip: âœ… Positive Prompt - Text prompt describing desired video content and features

negative_prompt.tooltip: âŒ Negative Prompt - Text prompt describing unwanted video elements to avoid

batch_size.name: ğŸ“¦ Batch Size
batch_size.tooltip: ğŸ“¦ Batch Size - Number of videos to generate in parallel

length.tooltip: ğŸ“½ï¸ Frame Length - Number of frames in the generated video

steps_high_noise.tooltip: ğŸ“Š High Noise Steps - Sampling steps for high noise phase (first stage)

cfg_high_noise.name: ğŸ›ï¸ High Noise CFG
cfg_high_noise.tooltip: ğŸ›ï¸ High Noise CFG - Used in high noise phase to balance randomness and prompt adherence. Increasing this value will make the results more aligned with the prompt, but too high may lead to decreased quality.

steps_low_noise.name: ğŸ“Š Low Noise Steps
steps_low_noise.tooltip: ğŸ“Š Low Noise Steps - Sampling steps for low noise phase (second stage)

cfg_low_noise.name: ğŸ›ï¸ Low Noise CFG
cfg_low_noise.tooltip: ğŸ›ï¸ Low Noise CFG - Used in low noise phase to balance randomness and prompt adherence. Increasing this value will make the results more aligned with the prompt, but too high may lead to decreased quality.

noise_seed.name: ğŸ² Noise Seed
noise_seed.tooltip: ğŸ² Noise Seed - Random seed for noise generation, identical seeds produce identical results

sampler_name.name: ğŸŒ€ Sampler
sampler_name.tooltip: ğŸŒ€ Sampler - Sampling algorithm that affects result quality, generation speed, and style.

scheduler.name: ğŸ“ˆ Scheduler
scheduler.tooltip: ğŸ“ˆ Scheduler - Noise scheduling method that controls how noise is gradually removed

start_image.tooltip: ğŸ–¼ï¸ Start Image (Optional) - First frame image for video generation (img2vid mode)

end_image.name: ğŸ–¼ï¸ End Image (Optional)
end_image.tooltip: ğŸ–¼ï¸ End Image (Optional) - Last frame image for video generation

clip_vision.name: ğŸ‘ï¸ CLIP Vision (Optional)
clip_vision.tooltip: ğŸ‘ï¸ CLIP Vision (Optional) - CLIP Vision model to encode reference images for conditioning

latent.name: ğŸŸ£ Latent (Optional)

torch_enable_fp16_accumulation.tooltip: âš¡ Torch FP16 Accumulation - Enable torch.backend.cuda.matmul.allow_fp16_accumulation for better VRAM efficiency (requires pytorch 2.7.0+)

sage_attention.name: ğŸ§  Sage Attention
sage_attention.tooltip: ğŸ§  Sage Attention - Global patch comfy attention to use sageattn, dramatically improves speed and VRAM usage, once enabled revert by re-running with disabled

wan_blocks_to_swap.name: ğŸ”„ WAN Blocks to Swap
wan_blocks_to_swap.tooltip: ğŸ”„ WAN Blocks to Swap - Number of transformer blocks to swap to CPU for low-VRAM usage (14B model has 40 blocks, 1.3B has 30)

sd3_shift.name: âš™ï¸ ModelSampling SD3 Shift
sd3_shift.tooltip: âš™ï¸ ModelSampling SD3 Shift - SD3 sampling algorithm shift parameter for controlling generation behavior

enable_clean_gpu_memory.tooltip: ğŸ—‘ï¸ Clean GPU Memory - Clean GPU memory before sampling and after decoding to free VRAM for other tasks

enable_clean_cpu_memory_after_finish.tooltip: ğŸ—‘ï¸ Clean CPU Memory After Finish - Clean CPU memory after generation completes

enable_sound_notification.name: ğŸ”Š Sound Notification
enable_sound_notification.tooltip: ğŸ”Š Sound Notification - Play notification sound when generation completes

WanVideoIntegratedKSamplerSimple.description: ğŸ³ WanVideo Integrated KSampler (Simple) - Github: https://github.com/luguoli - Simplified version of K-sampler for video generation, integrated high/low noise stages, designed for advanced users, direct two-stage sampling with pre-conditioned models, no need to connect so many wires~~~~ - ğŸ“§Email: luguoliï¹«vip.qq.com
